page.title: 11Events in Brodsworth.
page.content: The {Bishop}of Sheffield came to our school on the 26th of April 1985.We had a service.Mr Evans and the top year made a stole for the Bishop.It had angels on, and Saint Michael. We made the lunch, it was chicken and prawn salad, and for sweet it was chocolate mousse. The Bishop came to school to meet people in the Wath Deanery. About 80 people came to our service, which is usually attended by children and a few parents.We also provided the wine for communion. On the 20th July 1985, we had a{garden {party}in the hall grounds,it is to raise money for Brodsworth church, and Brodsworth school.We had games such as sponge throwing which was done by the children from Brodsworth School also we had stalls,such as white elephant, bring and buy, pink and blue etc.{Mrs {S Grant-Dalton}opened it.
